column5: Well another season has come and gone, and as usual, I'll post a photo recap.  It was a very strange season with the weather and the main lake not freezing.  I made the decision to take the winter off of guiding and I guess it was the best year to do it.  Keys this year were fishing deeper than usual (108-125) and staying mobile and away from the inevitable crowds. Best success came on X-Zone Swammers and tubes.  Enjoy the pics!!              Thanks for reading!
Those are some giant lakers right on dude!!
nice lakers Steve...looks like a good season after all...
Fish pornomegalus here Steve.  Not sure I've seen anyone this year have more Simcoe success than this.  Chin waaaay up dood for what was a short ice fishing season.
